name: You are being watched
description:
It was just another ordinary day on the country road leading you back home. Who would have thought how a small coincidence can turn your life on the path of unnatural events…

Look for supplies, store them in your inventory, explore all the rooms, solve puzzles, unlock areas of the map, interact, and try to collect everything you find.

Experience survival horror like never before and remember - You are being watched.

ITEMS

If you want to survive in the game you will need to look for essential items and manage them properly, because if you get short of any of them, it could mean your death.These are some of the items you can find on your journey through the game:

  • Food and meds: Regenerate part of health.
  • Weapons: We think you will get it.
  • Flashlight: Allows you to see in dark areas.
  • Documents and tapes: Provides relevant information.

FEATURES

Here are some of the current features of the game:

  • Immersive Experience: graphics and sounds as well as having minimal user interfaces will ensure a totally immersive experience that will keep you on your toes.
  • Inventory: You will be able to take various items and store them in your inventory, however, space is limited.
  • Respawn: The game incorporates a way to respawn, you will be able to respawn by watching ads.

DEVELOPMENT ROADMAP

We want to keep improving and developing the game, to the point it becomes full story horror. For this reason we will continue to polishing and adding new content to the game, these are some features that are planned to be added throughout the final development of the game:

  • More Levels
  • New Puzzles and Mechanics
  • More weapons
  • New type of monsters
  • New Items
  • Improve Gameplay
  • New Arena modes
  • Language Localization
